comments: Deb was amazing. She has been my favorite professor of all time. She truly cares about her students and loves teaching. So lucky to have been in her clinical group.

Deb is awesome. Very funny too. She made test outs sooooo laid back and doesn\'t make you feel like a nervous idiot like some profs in 320. She talks A LOT...sometimes it\'s hard to keep her focused but I just thought it was funny.

Deb is the most phenomenal professor I have had in the nursing program-both in lab and clinical. She is super supportive of her students and it\'s clear she loves to teach. She actively sought out clinical opportunities for us and was never condescending (as some clinical instructors can be). She made me fall in love with pediatrics!
She is awesome. So good at teaching the information. Compassionate if you have family emergencies. Laid back.
